Pressurised inhalation
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 8 - Warning: Do not stop taking this medicine unless your doctor tells you to stop

Label 10 - Warning: Read the additional information given with this medicine

Fostair 100micrograms/dose / 6micrograms/dose inhaler <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Chiesi Ltd)</ph> 12906411000001100

Beclometasone dipropionate 100 microgram per 1 dose

Formoterol fumarate dihydrate 6 microgram per 1 dose

  • 120 dose POM

    NHS indicative price = £29.32

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £29.32

BECLOMETASONE WITH FORMOTEROL
